typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Chrome as integer,
		{Chrome Mobile} as integer,
		Edge as integer,
		Safari as integer,
		{Mobile Safari} as integer,
		IE as integer,
		{IE Mobile} as integer,
		Firefox as integer,
		{Android Browser} as integer,
		{Samsung Browser} as integer,
		Opera as integer,
		{Opera Mini} as integer,
		{Opera Mobile} as integer,
		Unknown as integer,
		timestamp as string,
		analytics_group_id as long,
		analytics_filter_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['analytics_browsers_metrics/**/*.csv']) ~> AnalyticsBrowsersMetrics
AnalyticsBrowsersMetrics unpivot(output(
		browser_name as string,
		visits as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(analytics_group_id,
		analytics_filter_id,
		timestamp),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> UnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics
UnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics filter(visits > 0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE [web_analytics].[analytics_browsers_metrics]'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkUnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics
